sentences: Jackson Wang (Chinese: 王嘉爾; Korean: 왕잭슨; born 28 March 1994) is a Hong Kong rapper, singer, fashion designer and dancer based in China.
section: N/A

sentences: He is the founder of record label Team Wang, and is the creative director and lead designer for fashion brand Team Wang Design.
section: N/A

sentences: He is active in mainland China as a solo artist and television host.
section: N/A

sentences: He is a member of the South Korean boy group Got7, and also a member of the Chinese hip hop group Panthepack.
section: N/A

sentences: Born and raised in Hong Kong, Wang was a sabre fencer for Hong Kong's fencing team.
section: N/A

sentences: He was ranked eleventh in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics, and won first place at the Asian Junior and Cadet Fencing Championships in 2011.
section: N/A

sentences: After passing a music audition, he moved to Seoul, South Korea in July 2011 to pursue a career in K-pop.

sentences: Because of his work in the entertainment industry in China, Korea and the rest of the world, Jackson is proficient in a number of languages; he can fluently speak and understand Mandarin, Cantonese, Korean and English.

sentences: In August 2019, Wang uploaded a photo of the Chinese flag and declared himself as "one of 1.4 billion guardians of the Chinese flag" on his official Weibo account, after a Chinese flag was removed and tossed into the Victoria Harbour during the 2019-20 Hong Kong protests.
